text: He previously played a soldier in Game Of Thrones. And now Ed Sheeran, 27, could be set for one of his biggest acting roles to date as he is said to have landed a cameo in the upcoming Star Wars movie. According to The Sun, the Thinking Out Loud star will play a stormtrooper in Episode IX which is currently filming in Pinewood Studios. Actor : Ed Sheeran, 27, could be set for one of his biggest acting roles to date as he is said to have landed a cameo in the upcoming Star Wars movie Ed's reported cameo in the flick is being kept a secret and as the storm trooper's are suited soldiers, fans won't get to catch a glimpse of the flame - haired singer when the film hits screens. MailOnline has contacted a representative
